about.title: About
about.paragraph1: At 26, I made a bold career change from the restaurant industry to pursue my true passion: web development and programming.
about.paragraph2: Currently training as a Full Stack Web Developer at OpenClassrooms, I'm dedicated to building modern, performant, and user-friendly web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and TypeScript.
about.paragraph3: My background in hospitality taught me the value of attention to detail, working under pressure, and delivering exceptional experiences â€” skills I now apply to development.

bimisushi.title: BIMI SUSHI
bimisushi.description: A sushi restaurant website with online ordering and admin dashboard.
bimisushi.fullDescription: BIMI SUSHI is a sushi restaurant website that allows customers to browse the menu, place online orders, and manage reservations. The admin dashboard enables staff to manage orders, reservations, and the menu in real-time. This site is one of my first projects that went through the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript stage before being redone in React for better maintainability and performance.

blink.title: Blink
blink.description: A platform for creating invoices for freelancers and small businesses.
blink.fullDescription: Blink is a platform designed for freelancers and small businesses to create and manage invoices efficiently. It features a user-friendly interface and robust backend built with Next.js and Node.js, styled with Tailwind CSS, and uses MongoDB for data storage.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.description: A real estate rental platform offering a smooth and intuitive user experience.
kasa.fullDescription: Kasa is a real estate rental platform offering a smooth and intuitive user experience. This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms and helped me strengthen my React skills while focusing on user experience and performance.

Le Vieux grimoire.title: Le Vieux Grimoire
Le Vieux grimoire.description: A website for a bookstore specializing in old and rare books.
Le Vieux grimoire.fullDescription: Le Vieux Grimoire is a website for a bookstore specializing in old and rare books. For this project, I developed the entire backend as part of my training at OpenClassrooms.
